title: Israel withdraws troops from southern Gaza
summary: Israeli forces withdrew from parts of southern Gaza, citing a shift in military strategy.

title: Global markets react to inflation data
summary: Stock markets fluctuated as investors assessed new inflation data from major economies.

title: Taiwan hit by strongest earthquake in decades
summary: A powerful earthquake struck Taiwan, killing several people and damaging infrastructure.

title: Iran launches drones toward Israel
summary: Iran launched drones and missiles toward Israel in a major escalation of regional tensions.

title: EU investigates Big Tech firms
summary: European regulators launched investigations into major technology companies under new digital laws.

title: Gold prices hit record highs
summary: Gold prices surged to record levels amid geopolitical uncertainty and inflation fears.

title: World celebrates Earth Day 2024
summary: Countries marked Earth Day with renewed calls for climate action and environmental protection.

title: Ukraine receives new Western military aid
summary: Ukraine announced the arrival of additional military aid packages from Western allies.

title: Spain experiences mass power outages
summary: Large parts of Spain faced power disruptions following technical failures in the grid.

title: IMF raises global growth forecast
summary: The International Monetary Fund slightly upgraded its global economic growth outlook.
